headline: Dollar General earnings, Fedspeak, jobless claims: What to Watch
summary: Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Thursday, December 4, including earnings results from Dollar General (DG), Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), and Ulta Beauty (ULTA); commentary from Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman; and the latest reading on initial jobless claims. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

summary: Investors remain laser-focused on the Dec. 10 policy update from the Fed.

headline: Markets Gain on Fed Rate Cut Likelihood - CRM, FIVE Beat & Raise
summary: Weak jobs figures from ADP has helped solidify the belief that another 25 basis-point (bps) rate cut is coming next week.

raw.headline: Markets Gain on Fed Rate Cut Likelihood - CRM, FIVE Beat & Raise

headline: Assessing Albertsons Stock in 2025 After Regulatory Scrutiny of Proposed Kroger Merger
summary: If you have been wondering whether Albertsons Companies is quietly trading below what it is really worth, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack exactly that question. The stock has drifted lower year to date, down 9.2%, and is off 4.9% over the last year, but the longer term 5 year gain of 77.9% shows this has not always been a sleepy supermarket story. Recent headlines have largely focused on regulatory scrutiny and ongoing uncertainty around the proposed merger with Kroger,...

headline: Kroger’s Earnings Are Coming. Affordability Is a Key Word for the Grocer—and Consumers.
summary: While grocery sales are stable, shoppers remain sensitive to prices and seek discounted items. That could impact earnings.

headline: Macy's (M) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Macy's (M) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +169.23% and +2.56%, respectively, for the quarter ended October 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: National Giftcard Week Brings the Year’s Best Gift Card Deals to Major Retailers Nationwide
summary: PLEASANTON, Calif., December 03, 2025--National Giftcard Week (Dec. 7–13) brings exclusive gift card deals to major retailers, giving shoppers easy ways to save this holiday season.
